item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I wish I had more friends, but people are such jerks. If you can just get most people to leave you alone, you're doing good. If you can find even one person you really like, you're lucky. And if that person can also stand you, you're really lucky." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Not unlike the toaster, I control darkness." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Let me say right here, if I haven't made it clear, that I have seen as many pale, naked old-man parts in the last twenty-four hours to bruise my delicate psyche for a lifetime, so don't be surprised if you someday find me wandering the moors at midnight, a crazed look in my eye, babbling about albino Tater Tots nesting in Brillo pads and being pursued by sagging man ass, because that shit can happen when you've been traumatized." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "She doesn't understand that a writer is a special creature--that I'm different from everyone else. I'm not saying I'm superior to other people, just more sensitive, I guess." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Monty Python
item.description: "You see, I don't belive that libraries should be drab places where people sit in silence, that has been the main reason for our policy of employing wild animals as librarians." -- Monty Python

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Would it save you a lot of time if I just gave up and went mad now?" -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "You shall know the truth and the truth shall make you mad." -- Aldous Huxley

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Now this is the point. You fancy me a mad. Madmen know nothing. But you should have seen me. You should have seen how wisely I proceeded..." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you're looking for sympathy you'll find it between shit and syphilis in the dictionary." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "Please don't worry. It's a psychological complaint, common amongst ex-librarians. You see, she thinks she's a coffee table edition... " -- Alan Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "People, generally, suck." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Bryan Lee O'Malley
item.description: "Listen to this, okay? Just listen. You hear that? That's market bacon hitting the pan. Today a child is born unto us, and his name will be bacon. " -- Bryan Lee O'Malley

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "[...]I am a romance slut, and there's nothing I can do about it. If a guy does or says something romantic, I'm all "Oh, please excuse me, kind sir, let me dial down my IQ and oh, if it would please sir, may I offer you this moist, yet helpless va-jay-jay that seems to have lost its way." -The Chronicles of Abby Normal" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Then someone started pounding on the door. And not a little "Hey, what's up?" pound. Like there was a big sale on door pounds down at the Pound Outlet. Buy one, get one free at Pounds-n-Stuff. --Being the Journal of Abby Normal" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Lish McBride
item.description: "There were no windows in my bedroom, so I had to sit up and read my clock to figure out how angry I should be at my visitor. Eight A.M. I hated whoever woke me up. Had they come an hour earlier, I would have also hated their families and any household pets." -- Lish McBride

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by L.A. Meyer
item.description: "Then it hits me.... And it hits me with the force of a blow. I am maybe fifteen years old. I am a girl. I am also acting lieutenant in the Royal Navy, and, by the Naval Rules and Regulations as regards the chain of command, I am in command of His Majesty's Ship <i>Wolverine</i>." -- L.A. Meyer

item.title: Bonnie add a quote by Jo Goodwin
item.description: "A truly great library contains something in it to offend everyone." -- Jo Goodwin
